Container.Name: Air Video HD
Container.Description: [h3]Air Video HD[/h3]Everything that was great about Air Video, re-thought and re-engineered to bring you the best and most reliable streaming video app for iOS devices.[br][br] [b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Configuration:[/span][/b][br] Edit the file server.properties in your /config path. Follow the instructions in the file to add shares and users. Restart the container after saving your changes. To find your Server PIN, look in the network.log file in /config/logs after the server has started.[br][br][b][span style=\'color: #E80000;\']Volumes:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : this path is where the Air Video HD config file and logs will be.[br] [b]/conversionPath[/b] : if mapped, this is where temporary files will be kept by the transcoder.[br] [b]/applicationData[/b] : if mapped, this is where application data (playback status/server PIN) will be kept.[br] [b]/videos[/b] : this is the default path for share1.[br]
